snippet: State Senator Chris McDaniel is seeking to topple U.S. Senator Thad Cochran of Mississippi, but first he will have to explain comments he made in his days as a radio broadcaster.
abstract: Mississippi State Sen Chris McDaniel is seeking to topple US Sen Thad Cochran in Republican primary, but first he will have to explain controversial comments he made in his days as a radio broadcaster, including riffing on slavery, liberals and referring to Mexican women as 'mamacitas.'
lead_paragraph: State Senator Chris McDaniel is seeking to topple U.S. Senator Thad Cochran of Mississippi, but first he will have to explain comments he made in his days as a radio broadcaster.

headline.main: Radio Clip Shows Different Side of Republican Senate Challenger in Mississippi
headline.print_headline: Radio Clip Shows Different Side of Republican Senate Challenger in Mississippi
